title: My Next.js Portfolio
description: My old portfolio built with Next.js, and some questionable design choices.

title: Workout Buddy App
description: An app that will log my exercises with authentication and a database using the MERN Stack.

title: React Wordle Clone
description: A clone of the popular word cloud generator Wordle, built with React.

title: RadicalX Apprenticeship Project
description: A team project for my internship at RadicalX, a startup that helps people find their next job.

title: Next.js Ecommerce
description: For a Design Patterns project, we were asked to use the Factory and Abstract Factory patterns to build an e-commerce site.

title: Movies API
description: I decided to build put my Java experience in practice by building a RESTful API using Spring Boot

title: Remotion Intro
description: A simple intro video for my YouTube videos I made using Remotion, a React library for creating videos.

title: T3 Recipes App
description: A simple recipe app I made using Create T3 App.

title: Feedback App
description: A simple feedback app I made using Svelte.

title: S3 data uploader
description: This is a simple app I made to upload data to an S3 bucket using Svelte and the AWS SDK.

title: Bookmarx
description: I created a Chrome extension that allows you to bookmark your favorite websites and organize them into groups.

title: Sleek
description: A clone of tweek.so, a weekly planner. My version comes with an AI assistant that can help you with your daily tasks.

title: Project Explorer
description: A Visual Studio Code extension that allows you to explore your Next.js projects in a tree view.
